nodes.text: Cronnin was a male Human who lived during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. He was a military captain, at some point owning a shop on board Carrick Station.
Cronnin first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011, as a Balmorra planetary commendation vendor on board Carrick Station.
